Get to know Poland.			

A short introduction to Polish culture, geography, history and language.

A course popularizing Polish culture and promoting Poland as a country of attractive educational opportunities. The module is dedicated to all international students and PhD students participating in the Spinaker program. The module's duration is 15 hours, carried out in 2 weeks during online meetings and students' own work (asynchronously). The plan includes joint workshops on Polish culture, Polish language, geography and Polish history.
